ygData.subject: Another newbie fletcher!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail All I know you are all probably sick to death of answering stupid newbie questions about fletching but I need to ask as I don t want to throw what little
ygData.messageBody:
Hail All

I know you are all probably sick to death of answering stupid newbie
questions about fletching but I need to ask as I don't want to throw what
little money I have into nothingness :)

I am just setting out on my fletching career .. I am not doing this to make
lots of cash but to save a little by making my own arrows and enhancing my
char a little for roleplay .. I have spent 5 pracs in fletching so far and
intend to spend more when I level .. possibly another 10/15 .. is this a
good idea? What should I be making to improve me skills?

Any advice in my eyes is good advice and I really need some .. those damned
books I bought are no good at all .. I would have been better off buying
components :)

Thanks in advance

Ashanak
Level 4 Half Elf Ranger
Samsar
Level 11 Barbarian Warrior
Bristlebane
